pgrid.core
Class LocalRoutingTable

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      pgrid.core.RoutingTable
          pgrid.core.XMLRoutingTable
              pgrid.core.LocalRoutingTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, XMLizable
public class LocalRoutingTable
extends XMLRoutingTable

This class represents the Routing Table of the P-Grid facility. It includes the fidget hosts, the hosts for each level of a path, and the replicas.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

Constructor Detail

LocalRoutingTable

public LocalRoutingTable(String routeFile,
                         int port)
Create the routing table with the given file. If the given file exists, it is read in, otherwise it is created.

Parameters:
routeFile - the file to store the routing table.
port - the current listening port.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
If P-Grid is shutdown the routing table is saved to a file.

isNewIdentity

public boolean isNewIdentity()
True iff the local peer has not inserted its information (id, ip, E, ts, D(id, ip, E, ts)) into P-Grid.

Returns:
true if local peer is unknown for P-Grid

isModifiedIp

public boolean isModifiedIp()
True iff the new IP or port has changed since the last time this peer was run.

Returns:
if this peer has a new IP or port
